messages.content: Thank you for calling Google customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name, please?
It's Zachary. I'm really frustrated with Google Maps right now.
I'm sorry to hear that, Zachary. Can you tell me what specific issues you're experiencing with Google Maps?
The directions are terrible! They keep taking me on these weird, long routes. It's been driving me nuts!
I understand how frustrating that can be. Let's see what we can do to improve the quality of your experience. Have you tried updating the app to the latest version?
Yes, it's updated. This problem has been happening for a while, even with the latest updates.
Thank you for letting me know. Have you tried clearing the cache or reinstalling the app? Sometimes that can resolve routing issues.
I've done all that. Nothing works! Why can't you guys just fix the darn thing? It's ridiculous.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Zachary. We're continually working on improving Google Maps. Can you provide me with some specific examples of the routes that caused issues? This information will help our team to investigate and improve the quality.
Sure, but I don't have time to write down every single bad route. You guys should already be aware of these problems. It's not just me!

I understand your frustration, Zachary. Your feedback is invaluable and helps us make necessary improvements. I'll pass on your concerns to our technical team. In the meantime, I'll credit your account with some Google Play Store balance for the inconvenience.
Fine, but I'd rather have a product that actually works. Just make sure this gets fixed.
Absolutely, Zachary. We'll do our best to address this issue promptly. Thank you for your patience and for bringing this to our attention.
